title: Bracers of archery

These improve your skills with ranged weaponry but interfere slightly with melee combat.}} '''Bracers of archery''' are a type of hand-slot armour that give a +5, +3 [[slaying]] bonus to missile combat, but a -1, -1 slaying malus to melee combat. They do not affect spellcasting. There are no unbranded bracers - all are bracers of archery and identified as such on sight. ==Desirability== These are obviously more useful for those who primarily use missile combat, although the melee penalty is small enough that it is generally manageable, particularly if you have other slaying bonuses. ==History== In [[0.14]], these were removed. [[Archery]] became an [[ego]], found only on [[gloves]]. [[Category:Gloves]]
